reviews.customers_say: Customers love the style of this sweater dress and appreciate its soft fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater dress is under rated
items.body: Lovely oversized sweater!! Soft fabric!! I adore it but unfortunately need to return it because it is too long for me!! Read more
items.author: Alice

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super baggy but also cute
items.body: It is truly OVERSIZED, as described. There’s too much fabric for it to be worn with a belt. The fabric is soft and although I was unsure about how it looked because it’s so baggy, I received a lot of compliments in the dress. It’s not too short to wear to the office, which is a plus. For reference, I’m 5’4, 130lbs and ordered a small. Read more
items.author: Kathleen

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, too big, very disappointing.
items.body: Disappointed. Ordered a medium (I’m 5’1, 140lbs). It is HUGE. Not flattering. No figure. Cheap feeling. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dressy long sweater for women
items.body: A little to long and the neck was cut to deep. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater dress!
items.body: I love this dress. I'm 5'4 and can wear it comfortably with tights and boots as a dress. At the time of purchase, I'm a size 16 and where a DD bra. I purchased an XL based on recommendations but I supect could have gone with a L. The dress is very roomy... still love it though and have received tons of compliments! Read more
items.author: Sarah Y from Atlanta

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Different colors don’t fit the same
items.body: I ordered a small and a medium in the white, and a small in black. First thing to address, the white size small is huge but even so big that both my husband and I think it’s even bigger than the white medium! Don’t get me wrong, the white medium is also way too big and fits pretty much like the small maybe just a little less fabric hanging and bunching on the sides. They both are straight bags and it goes past my knees. No shape to it at all, you wouldn’t know I had a waist with the copious amount of fabric hanging on the sides. Like another reviewer said you can’t even wear a belt with it, it is just too much fabric bunching. I am 5’7” 150 lbs, so they were not kidding on oversized for the white one. I would say it’s actually a plus size cut. Now the black small actually looks like how the model is wearing it with maybe a little more shape to it but still oversized. When it comes to quality, I don’t know why reviews say the sweater is super cheap. I think it is normal quality for sweaters these days, I’ve received far worse sweaters before. The white material did feel a bit more dainty than the black but the white was also much softer. The black was definitely a bit more sturdy material than the white, black would snag way less but again not really soft. What I will say is I don’t think it’s worth the $42 dollar price I paid. I think they could get away with it at $29 bucks. Unfortunately, I am returning the white and probably will return the black as it doesn’t really work for the occasion I wanted it for. Honestly, if it wasn’t Christmas time I would most likely keep the black but I think I could use the $42 bucks on something else during this spending season. Read more
items.author: Tray

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy!
items.body: The material is soft and quality is good it’s a little thin but light weight the style of the neck is a wider than normal but the length is great I styled this with a lace top underneath and a lace skirt with knee high boots! Read more
items.author: Kristina

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars POORLY MADE .. LOOK CHEAP .. ITCHY
items.body: These sweaters are the WORST !! They are cheap and thin and scratchy and poorly made !!! NOT WORTH THE MONEY AT ALL !!! DO NOT PURCHASE !! Read more
items.author: Ruth

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Blue, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
